nodes.text: A non-sentient species of flying serpent lived on the Forest Moon of Endor, and at least one specimen lived in a cave. The creature had two small wings slightly forward of the midpoint of its body, and black eyebrows situated above yellow eyes with black pupils. Mostly a single shade of purple, but with a paler snout and spots on its wings, the creature had a forked tongue and four fangs. Its body, which was long and flexible, sported a rattle at the end, and its head featured several spikes. In 3 ABY, the Ewoks Weechee Warrick, Widdle Warrick, Paploo, and Teebo frightened one such serpent when they passed through its cave on their way to the Tree of Light.
The flying serpent first appeared in "The Tree of Light," the sixth episode of the Star Wars Legends animated series Ewoks' first season, which originally aired on October 12, 1985.
